nodes.bodyText: Bad name. Why if mention "single-switch"? It must be something like sendSwitchStatusUpdateNotification, the receiver can treat this notification in any required way.

Incorrect pattern usage. Each make*Tuple method serve corresponding stream. These methods make abstraction over stream fields set, that's why they are bound to streams. So if you push message into reroute stream, you must use makeRerouteTuple(...).
Why not a transaction over all flows not over each of them?
